column4: i rarely use my 1gig of ram in linux becuase it fails to access the internet :( and reso sits at 640x480
Did you install the nvidia-glx package?
did you setup your net configuration ?
Set it up on a static address. Would you be using hardwire or wireless?
And your routers DHCP isn't handing it an IP? Do what I did..set it up with a static address :-D
Hehe, your keyboard seems to be mad at you :)
Do you want me to PM you instructions with setting up Ubuntu on static address? I'm about to go to sleep.
I did :). asked you what kind of router you have.
What kind of router do you have? :)
What is your current IP and subnet mask and gateway?
Can you access your desktop (Xserver) or only terminal?
Ok, can you see desktop or only a console (like windows dos)
im seeing wat happens wen i run it in VMware
Ok, open terminal and type the following. sudo cp /etc/network/interfaces_backup    then type sudo gedit /etc/network/interfaces then on your primary device paste
that workd for the vmware ubuntu now ill boot up in ubuntu and see wat happens
